articles.title: Russian hackers targeted U.S. conservative think-tanks, says Microsoft
articles.description: "We’re concerned that these and other attempts pose security threats to a broadening array of groups connected with both American political parties in the run-up to the 2018 elections."

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Russia denies Microsoft allegations it targeted U.S. think tanks - Ifax
articles.description: The Russian authorities deny allegations from Microsoft that hackers linked to Russia's government tried to target the websites of two right-wing U.S. think-tanks, the Interfax news agency reported on Tuesday.

articles.title: EMERGING MARKETS-LatAm currencies up on Trump comments, Brazil real slips
articles.description: Most Latin American currencies strengthened on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump criticized the head of the Federal Reserve for raising interest rates, but the Brazilian real weakened due to concerns over the presidential elections. Trump told Reuters…

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kremlin says it does not understand Microsoft's U.S. hacking allegations
articles.description: The Kremlin said on Tuesday it did not understand allegations from Microsoft that hackers linked to Russia's government had tried to target the websites of two right-wing U.S. think-tanks.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Russia calls Microsoft's hacking allegations a "witch-hunt"
articles.description: Russian foreign ministry on Tuesday denounced as a "witch-hunt" accusations put forward by Microsoft Corp over alleged attempts by hackers linked to Russia's government to launch cyber attacks on U.S. institutions.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: WhatsApp to clamp down on "sinister" messages in India - IT minister
articles.description: Facebook-owned WhatsApp assured the Indian government on Tuesday that it would develop tools to combat the problem of fake messages, the country's information technology minister said.
